title: Pivotal Module Categories, Factorization Homology and Modular Invariant Modified Traces
summary: The algebraic notion of a pivotal module category was developed by Schaumann and Shimizu and is central to the description of boundary conditions in conformal field theory according to a proposal by Fuchs and Schweigert. In this paper, we present a large class of examples of pivotal module categories of topological origin: For a unimodular finite ribbon category $\mathcal{A}$, we prove that the factorization homology $\int_Σ\mathcal{A}$ of a compact oriented surface $Σ$ with $n$ marked boundary intervals, at least one per connected component, comes with the structure of a pivotal module category over $\mathcal{A}^{\boxtimes n}$. This endows the internal skein algebras of Ben-Zvi-Brochier-Jordan, in particular the elliptic double, with a symmetric Frobenius structure. As application, we obtain, for each choice of $\mathcal{A}$, a family of full open conformal field theories, each of which comes with correlation functions for all surfaces with marked boundary intervals that are explicitly computable using factorization homology. As a further application, we explain how modified traces can be 'integrated' over surfaces: We show that the modified trace for $\mathcal{A}$ extends in a canonical way to the factorization homology of $Σ$. The resulting traces have the remarkable property of being modular invariant, i.e. fixed by the mapping class group action.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于幺模有限辫范畴，曲面因子化同调具有关键模范畴结构，从而为共形场论提供边界条件，并得到对称Frobenius结构和模不变迹。
AI.motivation: Schaumann和Shimizu发展的关键模范畴概念是Fuchs和Schweigert提出的共形场论边界条件描述的核心。本文旨在从拓扑角度提供大量关键模范畴的实例。
AI.method: 对于幺模有限辫范畴A，证明紧致定向曲面Σ（每个连通分量至少有一个标记边界区间）的因子化同调∫_ΣA具有A^⊠n上的关键模范畴结构。该方法将Ben-Zvi-Brochier-Jordan的内部skein代数（特别是椭圆对偶）赋予对称Frobenius结构。
AI.result: 1. 为每个A提供一族完整的开放共形场论，其所有带标记边界区间的曲面的关联函数可通过因子化同调显式计算。2. 展示了修正迹可以"积分"到曲面上：A的修正迹以典范方式扩展到Σ的因子化同调，得到的迹具有模不变性（在映射类群作用下不变）。
AI.conclusion: 本文从拓扑角度构建了关键模范畴的重要实例，为共形场论边界条件提供了具体实现，并获得了具有模不变性的修正迹结构，在拓扑场论和共形场论之间建立了重要联系。

title: Quantum upper triangular matrix algebras
summary: Following the ideas in~\cite{yM88} and some inspiration from~\cite{KO24}, we construct a bialgebra $T_q(n)$ and a pointed Hopf algebra $UT_q(n)$ which quantize the coordinate rings of the algebra of upper triangular matrices and of the group of invertible upper triangular matrices of size $n\geq 2$, respectively, where $q$ is a nonzero parameter. The resulting structure on $UT_q(n)$ is neither commutative nor cocommutative, so we obtain a quantum group. The motivation comes from the idea of quantizing the incidence algebra of a finite poset, as the latter can be embedded as a subalgebra of the algebra of upper triangular matrices. After defining the bialgebra $T_q(n)$ and the Hopf algebra $UT_q(n)$, we study and compare their Lie algebras of derivations, their automorphism groups and their low degree Hochschild cohomology, in case $n=2$.

AI.tldr: 本文基于先前研究，构造了量化上三角矩阵坐标环的双代数T_q(n)和点化Hopf代数UT_q(n)，其中q为非零参数，这些结构既非交换也非余交换，形成了量子群。研究动机源于量化有限偏序集的关联代数，并重点分析了n=2时的导子李代数、自同构群和低阶Hochschild上同调。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于量化有限偏序集的关联代数，因为后者可以嵌入到上三角矩阵代数中。通过构造量化上三角矩阵坐标环的结构，可以探索量子群理论在组合代数结构中的应用。
AI.method: 基于yM88和KO24的思想，构造了双代数T_q(n)和点化Hopf代数UT_q(n)，分别量化上三角矩阵代数和可逆上三角矩阵群的坐标环。然后研究这些结构在n=2时的代数性质，包括导子李代数、自同构群和低阶Hochschild上同调。
AI.result: 成功构造了既非交换也非余交换的量子群结构UT_q(n)，实现了对上三角矩阵坐标环的量化。在n=2的情况下，详细分析了这些代数结构的导子李代数、自同构群和低阶Hochschild上同调性质。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功构造了量化上三角矩阵坐标环的量子群结构，为研究有限偏序集关联代数的量化提供了理论基础。对n=2情况的详细分析揭示了这些量子代数结构的代数性质，为进一步研究更一般情况奠定了基础。

title: Non-invertible defects from the Conway SCFT to K3 sigma models II: duality and Fibonacci defects
summary:
We continue the study, initiated in [hep-th:2504.18619], of topological defect lines (TDLs) in the Conway module $V^{f 
atural}$ and K3 non-linear sigma models (NLSMs). In the case of $V^{f 
atural}$, we fully classify the potential $N=1$ (and $N=4$)--preserving duality defects for cyclic Tambara--Yamagami categories TY$(\mathbb{Z}_N)$, noting a curious relation to genus zero groups of monstrous moonshine. We use the correspondence with Leech lattice endomorphisms, discovered in [hep-th:2504.18619], to construct a number of non-trivial examples of TDLs in $V^{f 
atural}$, including examples of irrational quantum dimension. In particular, we fully classify and construct defects for the TY$(\mathbb{Z}_2)$ and TY$(\mathbb{Z}_3)$ cases, and provide examples of duality defects for TY$(\mathbb{Z}_2	imes \mathbb{Z}_2)$ and Fibonacci fusion categories as well. In the case of K3 NLSMs, we describe a duality defect of irrational quantum dimension $\sqrt{2}$ for the category TY$(\mathbb{Z}_2, -1)$ in a particular torus orbifold, which exists on a 16-dimensional slice of the moduli space. We also provide a detailed analysis of spectral flow--preserving TDLs in Gepner models of K3, of independent interest, and use this to construct non-invertible defects for Fibonacci and $Rep(S_3)$ categories in particular examples. Finally we provide evidence for our conjecture in [hep-th:2504.18619] that special subcategories of such TDLs in $V^{f 
atural}$ correspond to $N=(4,4)$ and spectral flow--preserving defect lines in a corresponding K3 NLSM. In particular, we compute defect--twined elliptic genera for all non-invertible defects constructed in this article, demonstrating that for each defect found in a K3 NLSM, there is a corresponding defect in $V^{f 
atural}$ with coincident twining genus, and making a prediction for a number of TDLs in K3 NLSMs yet to be found.

AI.tldr: 该论文继续研究Conway模V^{f♮}和K3非线性σ模型中的拓扑缺陷线，分类了N=1和N=4保持的对偶缺陷，构造了非平凡缺陷示例，并建立了V^{f♮}与K3模型缺陷之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 继续研究拓扑缺陷线在Conway模V^{f♮}和K3非线性σ模型中的性质，探索对偶缺陷的分类与构造，并建立两种理论中缺陷之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 使用Leech格自同态的对应关系构造V^{f♮}中的非平凡缺陷；分析K3 Gepner模型中保持谱流的缺陷；计算缺陷扭曲椭圆亏格验证对应关系。
AI.result: 完全分类了TY(ℤ₂)和TY(ℤ₃)情况的缺陷；构造了TY(ℤ₂×ℤ₂)和Fibonacci融合范畴的对偶缺陷；在K3模型中发现了量子维数为√2的缺陷；验证了V^{f♮}与K3模型缺陷的对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了V^{f♮}与K3非线性σ模型中拓扑缺陷线的系统对应关系，为理解两种理论中的非可逆缺陷提供了新见解，并预测了K3模型中尚未发现的缺陷。

title: New universal vertex algebras as glueings of the basic ones
summary: There are three universal $2$-parameter vertex algebras $\mathcal{W}_{\infty}$, $\mathcal{W}^{\text{ev}}_{\infty}$, and $\mathcal{W}^{\mathfrak{sp}}_{\infty}$ which are freely generated of types $\mathcal{W}(2,3,4,\dots)$, $\mathcal{W}(2,4,6,\dots)$, and $\mathcal{W}(1^3, 2, 3^3, 4,\dots)$, respectively. They serve as classifying objects for vertex algebras with these generating types satisfying mild hypotheses. Their $1$-parameter quotients are expected to be the building blocks of all $\mathcal{W}$-algebras of classical Lie types. Furthermore, such $\mathcal{W}$-algebras are expected to be organized into families that are governed by new universal $2$-parameter vertex algebras, which are themselves glueings of copies of $\mathcal{W}_{\infty}$ in type $A$ (together with a Heisenberg algebra), and copies of $\mathcal{W}^{\text{ev}}_{\infty}$ and $\mathcal{W}^{\mathfrak{sp}}_{\infty}$ in types $B$, $C$, and $D$. We denote these universal objects by $\mathcal{W}^{X,S,M}_{\infty}$, where $X$ denotes the Lie type (either $A$, $C$, or $BD$ since types $B$ and $D$ can be treated uniformly), and $S$, $M$ are sets of positive integers that determine certain families of partitions. More precisely, for a partition $P = (n_0^{m_0}, n_1^{m_1},\dots, n_{t}^{m_t})$ of $N = \sum_{i=0}^t n_i m_i$ consisting of $m_i$ parts of size $n_i$, where $n_0> n_1 > \cdots > n_t \geq 2$, $M = \{m_0,\dots, m_t\}$ is the set of multiplicities, and $S = \{d_1,\dots, d_t\}$ is the set of height differences $d_{i+1} = n_i - n_{i+1}$. After introducing this general conjectural picture, we will construct the first nontrivial example $\mathcal{W}^{\mathfrak{so}_2}_{\infty}:=\mathcal{W}^{BD, \emptyset, \{2\}}_{\infty}$, which is a glueing of two copies of $\mathcal{W}^{\text{ev}}_{\infty}$.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了三类通用2参数顶点代数作为分类对象，并构建了首个非平凡示例
AI.motivation: 研究顶点代数的分类问题，特别是W-代数在经典李类型中的组织结构，寻找统一的数学框架来描述这些代数结构
AI.method: 提出三类通用2参数顶点代数作为分类对象，通过分区参数化构造代数族，并具体构建了第一个非平凡示例𝒲^{𝔰𝔬₂}_∞
AI.result: 成功构建了𝒲^{𝔰𝔬₂}_∞，这是两个𝒲^{ev}_∞的粘合，验证了理论框架的可行性
AI.conclusion: 提出的通用顶点代数框架有望统一描述经典李类型的W-代数，为顶点代数分类提供了新的理论工具

title: The Kontsevich invariant and the action of the Grothendieck--Teichmüller group on $2$-component string links
summary: The Kontsevich invariant of links is independent of the choice of associator, whereas for tangles this is not the case in general. In this paper, we focus on $2$-component string links and investigate to what extent the Kontsevich invariant depends on the choice of associator. As an application, we show that the action of the unipotent part of the Grothendieck--Teichmüller group on the algebra of proalgebraic $2$-component string links is non-trivial, which provides a partial answer to a problem posed by Furusho.

AI.tldr: Kontsevich不变量对于链环与选择结合子无关，但对链环则一般相关。本文研究2分量弦链环的Kontsevich不变量对结合子选择的依赖程度，并证明格罗滕迪克-泰希米勒群单部分对2分量弦链环代数的非平凡作用。
AI.motivation: Kontsevich不变量对于链环与结合子选择无关，但对链环则一般相关。本文旨在研究2分量弦链环的Kontsevich不变量在多大程度上依赖于结合子的选择，并回答Furusho提出的关于格罗滕迪克-泰希米勒群作用的问题。
AI.method: 聚焦于2分量弦链环，分析Kontsevich不变量对结合子选择的依赖关系。通过研究格罗滕迪克-泰希米勒群单部分在2分量弦链环代数上的作用来探讨这一问题。
AI.result: 证明了格罗滕迪克-泰希米勒群单部分对2分量弦链环代数的非平凡作用，这为Furusho提出的问题提供了部分答案。
AI.conclusion: Kontsevich不变量对结合子选择的依赖在2分量弦链环情形下具有非平凡性，格罗滕迪克-泰希米勒群单部分在相应代数上的作用也是非平凡的。

title: Classical and Quantum Algorithms for Topological Invariants of Torus Bundles
summary: Computing topological invariants of 3-manifolds is generally intractable, yet specialized algebraic structures can enable efficient algorithms. For Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev (WRT) invariants of torus bundles, we exploit the non-commutative torus structure to embed the skein algebra of the closed torus into its symmetric subalgebra at roots of unity. This yields a fixed $N^2$-dimensional representation that supports polynomial-time classical computation with $O(N^2)$ space, and a quantum algorithm using only $O(\log N)$ qubits -- an exponential space advantage. We further prove that extracting individual expansion coefficients is #P-complete, yet there is a quantum algorithm that can efficiently approximate these coefficients for a non-negligible fraction of configurations.

AI.tldr: 利用非交换环面结构将闭环面的skein代数嵌入到其对称子代数中，实现了WRT不变量在多项式时间内的经典计算和指数空间优势的量子算法。
AI.motivation: 计算3-流形的拓扑不变量通常难以处理，但特殊的代数结构可以实现高效算法。针对环面丛的WRT不变量，利用非交换环面结构来开发高效计算方法。
AI.method: 利用非交换环面结构，将闭环面的skein代数嵌入到其在单位根处的对称子代数中，得到一个固定的N²维表示，支持多项式时间的经典计算和仅需O(log N)量子比特的量子算法。
AI.result: 实现了多项式时间经典计算（O(N²)空间）和指数空间优势的量子算法（O(log N)量子比特）。证明提取单个展开系数是#P-完全的，但量子算法可以高效近似非平凡配置的系数。
AI.conclusion: 通过利用非交换环面结构，为环面丛的WRT不变量开发了高效的经典和量子算法，展示了量子计算在拓扑不变量计算中的指数空间优势。

title: Merge on workspaces as Hopf algebra Markov chain
summary: We study the dynamical properties of a Hopf algebra Markov chain with state space the binary rooted forests with labelled leaves. This Markovian dynamical system describes the core computational process of structure formation and transformation in syntax via the Merge operation, according to Chomsky's Minimalism model of generative linguistics. The dynamics decomposes into an ergodic dynamical system with uniform stationary distribution, given by the action of Internal Merge, while the contributions of External Merge and (a minimal form of) Sideward Merge reduce to a simpler Markov chain with state space the set of partitions and with combinatorial weights. The Sideward Merge part of the dynamics prevents convergence to fully formed connected structures (trees), unless the different forms of Merge are weighted by a cost function, as predicted by linguistic theory. Results on the asymptotic behavior of the Perron-Frobenius eigenvalue and eigenvector in this weighted case, obtained in terms of an associated Perron-Frobenius problem in the tropical semiring, show that the usual cost functions (Minimal Search and Resource Restrictions) proposed in the linguistic literature do not suffice to obtain convergence to the tree structures, while an additional optimization property based on the Shannon entropy achieves the expected result for the dynamics. We also comment on the introduction of continuous parameters related to semantic embedding and other computational models, and also on some filtering of the dynamics by coloring rules that model the linguistic filtering by theta roles and phase structure, and on parametric variation and the process of parameter setting in Externalization.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了一个描述乔姆斯基最简方案中句法结构形成的Hopf代数马尔可夫链，分析了不同Merge操作对动态系统收敛性的影响，发现传统语言学成本函数不足以收敛到树结构，而基于香农熵的优化方法能实现预期结果。
AI.motivation: 研究乔姆斯基最简方案中句法结构形成的计算过程，通过数学建模分析Merge操作如何驱动句法结构的动态演化，并检验语言学理论中提出的成本函数是否足以确保结构收敛。
AI.method: 构建基于二进制根标记叶森林状态空间的Hopf代数马尔可夫链，将Internal Merge、External Merge和Sideward Merge操作建模为不同的动态成分，使用Perron-Frobenius理论和热带半环分析渐近行为，引入香农熵优化方法。
AI.result: Internal Merge产生具有均匀平稳分布的遍历动态系统；External Merge和Sideward Merge简化为具有组合权重的分区马尔可夫链；传统成本函数（最小搜索和资源限制）无法确保收敛到树结构，而基于香农熵的优化方法能实现预期收敛。
AI.conclusion: 句法结构形成需要超越传统成本函数的优化机制，香农熵为基础的优化能确保Merge动态收敛到连接树结构，为语言学计算模型提供了数学验证框架，并可通过连续参数和着色规则扩展模型以模拟语义嵌入和参数设定等语言现象。
